english.segment1: It seems so clear today. Why not yesterday instant replay. There I go again without having anything to say
english.segment2: I don't lie everything I said to you was true. But still just words trying to convince myself of my position on the same level as you
english.segment3: Shut your eyes. Cover your ears. You can't see my eyes. Because my mouth is too wide open
english.segment4: When my mouth starts talking about everything I have and what I can bring. That is the proof for you that I have nothing
